revised_title: Electric Responses of Inorganic Substances and Vibrations of Rifle Barrels
tldr: This article presents a list of papers read to the Royal Society of London in 1901, including studies on the electric response of inorganic substances, vibrations of rifle barrels, and a conjugating yeast. The papers were communicated by notable members such as Sir M. Foster, Lord Rayleigh, Professor J. J. Thomson, Professor Marshall Ward, E. H. Starling, Professor Ewing, and Professor Ramsay.
